column5: Industrial farmhouse feel, in the country, just minutes from shops, restaurants, live music and Galleries. The perfect respite for couples and solo adventurers. Recognized by Texas Monthly Magazine for the past four years as one of their favorite places to stay when in the area! High end property for the discerning guest. FYI, we are required to charge a 13% hotel occupancy tax. A two night stay is required on holiday weekends.
